name: Bogdan Bogdanovic
comment: Bogdanovic is out Saturday against the Hornets due to right knee injury management, Lauren L. Williams of The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.

name: Jayson Tatum
comment: Tatum has been ruled out for Saturday's matchup in Toronto due to left wrist soreness.

name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Tuesday he plans to do his rehab in Boston so he can be around the team, Jay King of The Athletic reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Durant is expected to be sidelined for approximately one month after he was diagnosed Monday with an isolated MCL sprain of his right knee, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Gordon Hayward
comment: Hayward (hamstring) is likely to play in Saturday's game against Atlanta.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) is doubtful for Saturday's game against the Hawks.

name: LaMelo Ball
comment: Ball is doubtful for Saturday's game against the Hawks with a left ankle sprain and soreness in his left wrist.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre will undergo surgery on a torn ligament in his left hand and will be sidelined for 4-to-6 weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Ball said Monday that he's still experiencing some discomfort in his surgically repaired left knee and acknowledged the possibility that he might not be able to play during the 2022-23 season, K.C. Johnson of NBC Sports Chicago reports.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Green underwent an arthroscopic debridement of his right knee Wednesday and will be re-evaluated in approximately two weeks.

name: Dylan Windler
comment: Windler (ankle) is out Saturday against the Bucks and remains out indefinitely.

name: Donovan Mitchell
comment: Mitchell (groin) will not play Saturday versus the Bucks.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber said Wednesday that he hopes to return from a torn right hamstring prior to the All-Star break, Tim MacMahon of ESPN.com reports.

name: Vlatko Cancar
comment: Cancar (illness) is listed as questionable for Sunday's game against Oklahoma City.

name: Bones Hyland
comment: Hyland (finger) is questionable for Sunday's matchup against the Thunder.

name: Nikola Jokic
comment: Jokic (hamstring) has been termed questionable to don the uniform Sunday versus the Thunder.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) is listed as out for Tuesday's game against the Trail Blazers.

name: Peyton Watson
comment: Watson will be sidelined for a "couple of weeks" due to a left adductor strain, Harrison Wind of TheDNVR.com reports.

name: Nerlens Noel
comment: Noel (knee) didn't appear in Thursday's loss to the Bulls.

name: Buddy Boeheim
comment: Boeheim (toe) is out for Sunday's game against the Knicks.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley underwent surgery to repair a fracture of the third and fourth metacarpals in his right hand Thursday and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: James Wiseman
comment: Wiseman (ankle) will remain sidelined for Friday's game versus the Cavaliers.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip) has been ruled out for Friday's game against Cleveland.

name: Jabari Smith Jr.
comment: Smith (ankle) is officially doubtful for Saturday's meeting with the Timberwolves.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot) is officially doubtful for Saturday's matchup against Minnesota.

name: Andrew Nembhard
comment: Nembhard is questionable for Saturday's game against the Suns due to an illness.

name: Tyrese Haliburton
comment: Haliburton suffered a sprained left elbow and a mild left knee bruise during Wednesday's loss to the Knicks and will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports. The team is also waiting on additional opinions on Haliburton's scan results.

name: Kendall Brown
comment: Pacers head coach Rick Carlisle said Tuesday that Brown (lower leg) has been cleared to take part in more activities during practice, but the rookie remains without a clear timeline to make his season debut, Tony East of SI.com reports.

name: Daniel Theis
comment: Pacers head coach Rick Carlisle said Tuesday that Theis (knee) has been cleared to take part in more activities during practice, but the center remains without a clear timeline to make his season debut, Tony East of SI.com reports.

name: Luke Kennard
comment: Kennard (calf) did not practice Saturday, Andrew Greif of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: John Wall
comment: Clippers head coach Tyronn Lue said Sunday that Wall has been diagnosed with an abdominal strain and will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.

name: Austin Reaves
comment: Reaves (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in a week, Kyle Goon of The Orange County Register reports.

name: Anthony Davis
comment: Davis (foot) continues to make pain-free progress and could return to the Lakers' starting lineup as soon as late next week, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Lonnie Walker IV
comment: Walker has been diagnosed with left knee tendinitis and will reevaluated in approximately two weeks, Mike Trudell of Spectrum SportsNet reports.

name: Danny Green
comment: Green (knee) started doing 5-on-5 work last week, Damichael Cole of The Memphis Commercial Appeal reports.

name: Udonis Haslem
comment: Haslem (Achilles) is likely to suit up for Sunday's game against the Pelicans, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Robinson will undergo finger surgery and be out for four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) will miss another four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven underwent successful surgery Tuesday to address an impingement, bone spur and stress reaction in his left ankle and is out indefinitely.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
comment: Antetokounmpo (knee) is out Saturday against the Cavaliers.

name: Khris Middleton
comment: Middleton (knee) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Cavaliers.

name: Serge Ibaka
comment: Ibaka (personal) and the Bucks mutually agreed Friday to begin pursuing trade opportunities, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Towns revealed he has a Grade 3 right calf strain and will be out longer than the initially reported 4-to-6 weeks time table, the Minneapolis Star Tribune reports. "I wish it was four to six weeks. I knew then it wasn't going to be four to six," Towns said during a Twitch livestream.

name: Austin Rivers
comment: Rivers (knee) is questionable for Saturday's matchup against the Rockets.

name: Anthony Edwards
comment: Edwards (hip) is questionable  for Saturday's game against Houston.

name: Rudy Gobert
comment: Gobert (groin) is questionable for Saturday's matchup against the Rockets.

name: Jordan McLaughlin
comment: Timberwolves head coach Chris Finch said Monday that he doesn't expect McLaughlin (calf) to return to game action anytime soon, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Naji Marshall
comment: Marshall (toe) is doubtful for Sunday's matchup with the Heat.

name: Brandon Ingram
comment: Ingram (toe) remains out Sunday against the Heat.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in three weeks.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Robinson (thumb) underwent surgery Thursday to repair his broken right thumb and will be re-evaluated in three weeks.

name: Jeremiah Robinson-Earl
comment: Robinson-Earl (ankle) will not play in Friday's game against Sacramento.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Jonathan Isaac
comment: Isaac (knee, conditioning) remains out Saturday at Washington.

name: Chuma Okeke
comment: Okeke recently underwent an arthroscopic procedure on his left knee and will be re-evaluated in four weeks.

name: James Harden
comment: Harden is questionable for Saturday's game against the Kings due to injury management for a tendon strain in his right foot.

name: Chris Paul
comment: Paul (hip) will not play Saturday against the Pacers, Gerald Bourguet of GoPHNX.com reports.

name: Deandre Ayton
comment: Ayton is considered questionable for Saturday's game against the Pacers due to a non-COVID related illness, Gerald Bourguet of GoPHNX.com reports.

name: Cameron Johnson
comment: Johnson (knee) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Pacers, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Josh Okogie
comment: Okogie (nose) is questionable for Saturday's game against the Pacers, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Pacers, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: Crowder, who has been away from the Suns all season while the team explores avenues to trade him, has been working out daily in Atlanta in order to stay ready for his next opportunity to play, Chris Haynes of BleacherReport.com reports.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: Payne (foot) will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Devin Booker
comment: Booker (groin) is out for at least four weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: WInslow (ankle) is showing significant improvement but is expected to miss at least the next two weeks.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) was spotted Tuesday doing some walking on a treadmill, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: Dalano Banton
comment: Banton (hip) will not play in Saturday's game against the Celtics, Blake Murphy of Sportsnet.ca reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Kelly Olynyk
comment: Olynyk (ankle) has begun on-court work but will likely miss another week, Andy Larsen of The Salt Lake Tribune reports.
